chart.title: Births and deaths per year
chart.subtitle: Future projections are based on the [UN's medium scenario](#dod:un-projection-scenarios).

Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.descriptionShort: Number of deaths recorded annually, based on the civil calendar year, spanning from January 1 to December 31.
Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Number of deaths,total – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.titleLong: Number of deaths,medium projection - UN WPP
Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.descriptionShort: Number of deaths recorded annually, based on the civil calendar year, spanning from January 1 to December 31.Projections from 2024 onwards are based on the UN's medium scenario.
Deaths - Sex: all - Age: all - Variant:.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
